name: FLOWERBED (tuslir)
description:
--- it is evening, early August. tonight is a blank slate. open-ended and numbing. ---

you are at a party where you only know one other person. but then -- who's the girl in the corner?

---

flowerbed is a narrative game based on my personal experience with autistic masking. play as rebecca, an autistic lesbian, and get to know a tight-knit group of friends in a dead-end town. take on their mannerisms and mirror their behavior to unlock dialogue options and progress the story.

this game made in six weeks for my system design exam, spring semester of 2022.

design, code and art by me. <3

---

assets used
title theme: we all fall down by radical face, off the 2018 album missing film
music: night life from synthwave music pack by VOiD1 Gaming
fonts: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen, Minlie by SPOICAT
main menu/header image art created with pixsy, images from unsplash.com.

---

2. open Build file and run arbeidsmappe2.exe

3. jam out
